page.title: 12Employment in Cupar
page.content: The{main employers}in the Cupar area are the service industries_ Fife Regional Council & the North_ East Fife District Council. Another{big {employer}is Fife Health Board, who employ people for the Adamson & Stratheden Hospitals. Farms around the area do{employ}people but this is mainly seasonal work & the jobs are not permanent. The most popular jobs people look for are connected with shop work, catering, cleaning, construction & transport. Between April 1984 & March 1985 there were 873 vacancies in Cupar & 589 people were placed in jobs. According to the Benefit Office,{unemployment}is round about the national average with 391 men & 224 women{unemployed}in Cupar.
